name: Hebiko
text: Hmph! You guys are all talk. Go and cool your heads a little!!
Hebiko grabbed the forcibly pacified ninja attackers with her octopus tentacles and tossed them into the pool.

name: Hebiko
text: How about some ink for good measure.

name: Me
text: Don't do that. The pool will get dirty and we'll get stuck having to clean it.

name: Hebiko
text: Ah, that's right. Hebiko doesn't want to have to do that just for those birdbrains.
The birdbrains in question had gotten sopping wet and left in a hurry.

name: Shikanosuke
text: Uwuwuh, why did I have to go through all of this because of those morons? I'm not even a Fuma...

name: Hebiko
text: Shikanosuke-chan, you're terrible. He's your friend, right?

name: Shikanosuke
text: Yeah, but... I have a feeling that something like this is going to keep happening, and somehow I'm going to get caught up in it every time, you know?

name: Me
text: Who knows.
I sympathized with Shikanosuke, who was prone to getting involved in trouble against his will, but brushed him off nonchalantly.

name: Me
text: Hey, you, spectator over there. Would you get out here already.

name: Yukikaze
text: Oh, you saw me?
Yukikaze appeared from the shadows of the locker room and cheekily stuck out her tongue.

name: Hebiko
text: Oh, Yukikaze-chan!

name: Shikanosuke
text: You were watching us from over there?

name: Yukikaze
text: I mean, I have nothing to do with the Fuma Clan quarrels.

name: Shikanosuke
text: Neither do I!

name: Yukikaze
text: Right right, you've got it rough, Shikanosuke. Hebiko-chan and Fuma too... You look like you're going through a lot.

name: Me
text: It's because of what happened. I can't help it.

name: Yukikaze
text: They were asking a bunch of stuff, and I was wondering about that too.

name: Me
text: About what?

name: Yukikaze
text: What are you going to do as the head of the Fuma Clan? You sidestepped it earlier.

name: Me
text: I didn't really sidestep it. Honestly, I'm just a little lost on some things.

name: Yukikaze
text: Is that so?

name: Me
text: Because I still don't know anything.

name: Me
text: As I told them, first we're going to capture Gaiza and find out what he's up to. Then we'll take it from there.

name: Me
text: It's not my way to decide if things should go this way or that when I hardly have any information.

name: Yukikaze
text: Hmmm... I guess that's fine then.
Surprisingly, Yukikaze nodded with a convinced look.
Judging from Yukikaze's personality, I thought she'd say I was being wishy-washy or something.

name: Yukikaze
text: I'm the same. There's something I absolutely want to do, but I'm not quite sure what the best way to do it is yet...
Yukikaze cast her eyes downward as she spoke.

name: Me
text: (Something she absolutely wants to do...?)
I was curious, but didn't dare to ask.
I was sure she wouldn't talk to me about it.
We had only known each other for a short time, but I could tell that much from her expression. Hebiko and Shikanosuke also seemed to be able to tell.

name: Yukikaze
text: Alright, let's go grab something to eat! You only used your head, Fuma, but you're still hungry, right? I'm starving too.
Yukikaze smiled cheerfully.
